column5: Now I get it, that's how it's done.  Cool video, and a nice pike.
Ya outta add some funky beats to that and make it in to a workout video!!  cheers HD
Great job trophypikehunter  Big gator for sure Thanks for sharing Leechman
Great fish! Your other vids are cool too.
I'm lovin' your vids man!  I admire the guts it takes to stick your hand down the hole to retrieve a toothy critter full of trebles.
That was a great vid!!!  Are you just using a single hook?... because the thought of being attached to a mean-  Pike by a treble hook while under the ice makes my butthole pucker severely!!!
Great Vid man! Nice fish as well! I couldn't help but notice that as the video went on, your hands were beginning to match your red coat!!! Thanks for posting! HH
Nice job on catching that real nice pike. Brutal having to stick your arm way in the water to get it on the ice.  Congrats that is tough work

Thanks everybody for the kind words   Yah GCD I do use a treble and I always have a good look before I gill the fish.. Was out again this morning and scored another stay tuned I'm just uploading the video now...
